creator: librivoxaudio
description:
LibriVox recording of Adventurers of the Far North, by Stephen Leacock. Read by TriciaG.

This is volume 20 of The Chronicles of Canada series. This volume describes the explorers who braved the Canadian Arctic in search of the Northwest Passage, focusing on Samuel Hearne, Sir Alexander Mackenzie, and Sir John Franklin. (Summary by TriciaG)

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

M4B format available
subject: LibriVox; audiobook; history; Canada; Canadian history; exploration; Arctic region; Samuel Hearne; Alexander Mackenzie; John Franklin
title: Chronicles of Canada Volume 20 - Adventurers of the Far North
